meanings.definition: A person or thing that launches.
meanings.sent1: The rocket launcher sent the spacecraft into space.
meanings.sent2: The launcher at the track meet signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent3: The watermelon launcher at the fair was a big hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a launcher, propelling joy into the room.
meanings.sent5: The launcher, with a swift motion, threw the ball far into the field.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to launch something, such as a rocket or missile.
meanings.sent1: The missile launcher aimed at the target.
meanings.sent2: The rocket launcher was ready for liftoff.
meanings.sent3: The snowball launcher made winter games more exciting.
meanings.sent4: His words were a launcher of inspiration, igniting passion in his listeners.
meanings.sent5: The launcher's powerful force propelled the object high into the sky.

meanings.definition: A software application used to start other programs or processes.
meanings.sent1: The app launcher on his phone made it easy to access different apps.
meanings.sent2: The computer launcher quickly opened the desired program.
meanings.sent3: The game launcher on her laptop always glitched at the worst times.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a launcher of positivity, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The launcher on the desktop was the gateway to all the software on the computer.
